item.title: Agile Software Development: Taming the Chaos (or Just Adding More?)
item.description: As a seasoned software engineer (and fellow survivor of the code trenches), I’m sure you’ve seen development methodologies come and go. We all remember the rigid, documentation-heavy days of Waterfall, where a project plan was etched in stone like the Ten Commandments, and any change required an act of Congress.
